title_desc: Our mission is to perform for our customers the highest level of quality Demolition services at fair and market competitive prices
we_under: Free Demolition of buildings for scrap
about_intro: Demolish your buildings and remove building debris for free by making up for scrap. Quality, efficiency, on time work is our priority. More than twenty years of experience in the field of building demolition throughout the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
card1: Providing services to demolish buildings for free by getting scrap for the entire building.
card2: Demolition of high commercial towers, squares, and markets. From single-story to multi-store towers. Providing services even in a crowded city without affecting the surrounding environment.
card3: Disposal of houses, apartments, prince villas, innovation palaces, and demolition through compensation for scrap steel.
value-intro: It is Our Business to Supply Safe, SCALABLE Demolition Services for a Wide Variety of Commercial, industrial and Residential Areas.
specalise1-def: We demolish different kinds of buildings and villas
specalise2-def: Structural demolition—versus complete building demolition—typically involves selective demolition within a concrete and steel structure.
specalise3-def: Our work involves the removal of interior demolition of items neatly and cleanly.
specalise4-def: Selective concrete demolition uses specialized techniques to safely and successfully remove concrete from specific areas
specalise5-def: Concrete and building waste disposal can be performed without troubling someone, We do it fast and safely.
specalise6-def: we have more than a 10-Years-long resume of Safety and Successfully Demolish and Remove Wastes of any type of Structure.
demolish6-exp: Removing specific parts of a building
recent-proj-1: A large government sewerage system  project is completed recently
recent-proj-2: Villa, House, Gas station demolition project completed recently
recent-proj-3: A million dollars of Concrete and building waste disposal projects are completed recently
working-def: We work 7 days a week, every day excluding major holidays. Contact us if you have an emergency, with ourHotline and Contact form.
